name: SILVER - Kapanlagi Clubbing
description:
KapanLagi Clubbing "Nu-Millenium" style. You may also find this style at http://kapanlagi.com/clubbing/showthread.php?t=23729. Inspired by and many many Thanks to Keluarga Ganteng (Ganteng Family at Kaskus - Mozilla Firefox Fans Club) ... "yeah oom, I did it!" :)

Regards
